title: Editorial Expression of Concern: Non-negligible cascading impacts of global urban expansion on net primary productivity
content: PNAS Nexus is publishing an Editorial Expression of Concern regarding the following article: “Non-negligible cascading impacts of global urban expansion on net primary productivity” by Kangyao Liu, Fengsong Pei, Xiaoping Liu, Zhenzhong Zeng, Peng Zhu, Chuanglin Fang, Xiaocong Xu, Shaojian Wang, Jiafu Mao, Xiuzhi Chen, Changjiang Wu, Yiling Cai, Li Zeng, Qian Shi, Xia Li, which was published as an Advanced Article June, 4 2024; 10.1093/pnasnexus/pgae220 (PNAS Nexus, pgae220, https://doi.org/10.1093/pnasnexus/pgae220).
